question: The world's tallest hotel developed by the Al Attar Group was opened in ___________.
explanation: The Gevora Hotel in Dubai, developed by the Al Attar Group now become the "world's tallest hotel". It stands 356 meters and 53 centimeters tall. It is one meter taller than the previous holder of the title, the JW Marriott Marquis, in the same city. The title has been confirmed by Guinness Book of World Records.
